name: Dragon Skater - Collect Those Gold Coins!
name_original: Dragon Skater - Collect Those Gold Coins!
description:
Skateboarding Dragons!! :)

Scream down those hills! Get the the end of the level before the time runs out and collect as much GOLD as you can!! :)

Unlock new Dragon characters! Complete levels collecting as many brains (mmmm... brains....) as you can!

GAME FEATURES:

‣ GREAT AND FUN APP SUITABLE FOR ALL AGES!
‣ Cool graphics!
‣ Funny and evil monsters!
‣ SPOOKY MUSIC!
‣ 100% PURE SKATEBOARDING FUN FUN FUN!!!!


Note: This app contains the ability to purchase optional content using real money. If you don't want this feature, disable payment features in your device in-app purchases settings.

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
